scripts.serve: npm run build && firebase emulators:start --only functions
scripts.stop: npm run build && yarn build && lsof -t -i :5001 -i:5002 -i:8083 -i:5001 -i:5003 -i:9000 -i:5000 -i:8084 | xargs kill -9
scripts.localrun: npm run build && yarn build && lsof -t -i :5001 -i:5002 -i:8083 -i:5001 -i:5003 -i:9000 -i:5000 -i:8084 | xargs kill -9 && firebase emulators:start
